Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.name: wrappedValue
Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.abstract: The value wrapped in the fixed-size container

Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.name: init(wrappedValue:)
Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.abstract: Wrap an integer value in a fixed-size container

Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.name: encode(to:)
Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.abstract: Encode the wrapped value transparently to the given encoder.

Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.name: init(from:)
Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.abstract: Decode a wrapped value from a decoder.

Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.name: max
Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.abstract: The maximum representable integer in this type.

Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.name: min
Structs/SignedValue.html#/s:13BinaryCoda.abstract: The minimum representable integer in this type.

Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.name: wrappedValue
Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.abstract: The value wrapped in the fixed-size container

Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.name: init(wrappedValue:)
Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.abstract: Wrap an integer value in a fixed-size container

Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.name: encode(to:)
Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.abstract: Encode the wrapped value transparently to the given encoder.

Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.name: init(from:)
Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.abstract: Decode a wrapped value from a decoder.

Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.name: max
Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.abstract: The maximum representable integer in this type.

Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.name: min
Structs/FixedSize.html#/s:13BinaryCodabl.abstract: The minimum representable integer in this type.

Structs/FixedSize.html.name: FixedSize
Structs/FixedSize.html.abstract: A wrapper for integer values which ensures that values are encoded in binary format using a fixed size.

Structs/SignedValue.html.name: SignedValue
Structs/SignedValue.html.abstract: A wrapper for integers more efficient for negative values.

Protocols/FixedSizeCompatible.html#/s:13.name: fixedSizeDataType
Protocols/FixedSizeCompatible.html#/s:13.abstract: The wire type of the type, which has a constant length

Protocols/FixedSizeCompatible.html#/s:13.name: fixedProtoType
Protocols/FixedSizeCompatible.html#/s:13.abstract: The protobuf type equivalent to the fixed size type

Protocols/FixedSizeCompatible.html#/s:13.name: fixedSizeEncoded
Protocols/FixedSizeCompatible.html#/s:13.abstract: The value encoded as fixed size binary data

Protocols.html#/s:13BinaryCodable13Proto.name: ProtobufOneOf
Protocols.html#/s:13BinaryCodable13Proto.abstract: Add conformance to this protocol to enums which should be encoded as Protobuf Oneof values.

Protocols/FixedSizeCompatible.html.name: FixedSizeCompatible
Protocols/FixedSizeCompatible.html.abstract: An integer type which can be forced to use a fixed-length encoding instead of variable-length encoding.

Protocols/SignedValueCompatible.html.name: SignedValueCompatible
Protocols/SignedValueCompatible.html.abstract: A signed integer which can be forced to use zig-zag encoding.

Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: nilValuesNotSupported
Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: The encoded type contains optional values, which are not supported in the protocol buffer format.

Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: unsupportedType(_:)
Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: The encoded type contains a basic type that is not supported.

Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: superNotSupported
Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Protocol buffers don’t support inheritance, so super can’t be encoded.

Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: missingIntegerKey(_:)
Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: The encoded type contains properties which don’t have an integer key.

Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: multipleTypesInUnkeyedContainer
Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: All values in unkeyed containers must have the same type.

Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: integerKeyOutOfRange(_:)
Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Field numbers must be positive integers not greater than 536870911 (2^29-1, or 0x1FFFFFFF)

Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: multipleContainersAccessed
Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Multiple calls to container<>(keyedBy:), unkeyedContainer(), or singleValueContainer() for an encoder.

Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: noContainersAccessed
Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: No calls to container<>(keyedBy:), unkeyedContainer(), or singleValueContainer() for an encoder.

Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: rootIsNotKeyedContainer
Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Protobuf requires an unkeyed container as the root node

Enums/ProtobufDecodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: superNotSupported
Enums/ProtobufDecodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Protocol buffers don’t support inheritance, so super can’t be encoded.

Enums/ProtobufDecodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: unsupportedType(_:)
Enums/ProtobufDecodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: The encoded type contains a basic type that is not supported.

Enums/ProtobufDecodingError.html#/s:13Bi.name: invalidAccess(_:)
Enums/ProtobufDecodingError.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: A decoding feature was accessed which is not supported for protobuf encoding.

Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.name: variableLengthInteger
Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.abstract: An integer value encoded as a Base128 Varint.

Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.name: byte
Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.abstract: The value is encoded as a single byte.

Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.name: twoBytes
Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.abstract: The value is encoded as two bytes.

Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.name: variableLength
Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.abstract: The value is encoded using first a length (as a UInt64 var-int) followed by the bytes.

Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.name: fourBytes
Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.abstract: The value is encoded using four bytes.

Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.name: eightBytes
Enums/DataType.html#/s:13BinaryCodable8D.abstract: The value is encoded using eight bytes.

Enums/DataType.html.name: DataType
Enums/DataType.html.abstract: The data type specifying how a value is encoded on the wire.

Enums/ProtobufDecodingError.html.name: ProtobufDecodingError
Enums/ProtobufDecodingError.html.abstract: An error produced while decoding binary data.

Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html.name: ProtobufEncodingError
Enums/ProtobufEncodingError.html.abstract: An error thrown when encoding a value using ProtobufEncoder.

Classes/ProtobufEncoder.html#/s:13Binary.name: userInfo
Classes/ProtobufEncoder.html#/s:13Binary.abstract: Any contextual information set by the user for encoding.

Classes/ProtobufEncoder.html#/s:13Binary.name: encode(_:)
Classes/ProtobufEncoder.html#/s:13Binary.abstract: Encode a single value to binary data using a default encoder.

Classes/ProtobufDecoder.html#/s:13Binary.name: userInfo
Classes/ProtobufDecoder.html#/s:13Binary.abstract: Any contextual information set by the user for decoding.

Classes/ProtobufDecoder.html#/s:13Binary.name: decode(_:from:)
Classes/ProtobufDecoder.html#/s:13Binary.abstract: Decode a single value from binary data using a default decoder.

Classes/BinaryStreamEncoder.html#/s:13Bi.name: encode(_:)
Classes/BinaryStreamEncoder.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Encode an element for the data stream.

Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.name: add(_:)
Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Add new data to the internal buffer without attempting to decode elements.

Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.name: discardBytes(_:)
Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Discard bytes from the currently remaining bytes.

Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.name: decode(_:returnElementsBeforeError:)
Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Read elements from the stream until no more bytes are available.

Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.name: decodeElementsUntilError()
Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Read elements from the stream until an error occurs.

Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.name: decodeElements()
Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Read elements until no more data is available.

Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.name: decodeElement()
Classes/BinaryStreamDecoder.html#/s:13Bi.abstract: Attempt to decode a single element from the stream.

Classes/BinaryFileEncoder.html#/s:13Bina.name: write(_:)
Classes/BinaryFileEncoder.html#/s:13Bina.abstract: Write a single element to the file.

Classes/BinaryFileEncoder.html#/s:13Bina.name: write(contentsOf:)
Classes/BinaryFileEncoder.html#/s:13Bina.abstract: Write a sequence of elements to the file.

Classes/BinaryFileDecoder.html#/s:13Bina.name: read(_:)
Classes/BinaryFileDecoder.html#/s:13Bina.abstract: Read all elements in the file, and handle each element using a closure.

Classes/BinaryFileDecoder.html#/s:13Bina.name: readAllUntilError()
Classes/BinaryFileDecoder.html#/s:13Bina.abstract: Read all elements at once, and ignore errors.

Classes/BinaryFileDecoder.html#/s:13Bina.name: readElement()
Classes/BinaryFileDecoder.html#/s:13Bina.abstract: Read a single elements from the current position in the file.

Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.name: sortKeysDuringEncoding
Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.abstract: Sort keyed data in the binary representation.

Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.name: prependNilIndexSetForUnkeyedContainers
Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.abstract: Add a set of indices for nil values in unkeyed containers.

Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.name: userInfo
Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.abstract: Any contextual information set by the user for encoding.

Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.name: encode(_:)
Classes/BinaryEncoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.abstract: Encode a single value to binary data using a default encoder.

Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.name: userInfo
Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.abstract: Any contextual information set by the user for decoding.

Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.name: containsNilIndexSetForUnkeyedContainers
Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.abstract: Assumes that unkeyed containers are encoded using a set of indices for nil values.

Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.name: decode(_:from:)
Classes/BinaryDecoder.html#/s:13BinaryCo.abstract: Decode a single value from binary data using a default decoder.

Classes/BinaryDecoder.html.name: BinaryDecoder
Classes/BinaryDecoder.html.abstract: An encoder to convert binary data back to Codable objects.

Classes/BinaryEncoder.html.name: BinaryEncoder
Classes/BinaryEncoder.html.abstract: An encoder to convert Codable objects to binary data.

Classes/BinaryFileEncoder.html.name: BinaryFileEncoder
Classes/BinaryFileEncoder.html.abstract: Encode a stream of elements to a binary file.

Classes/BinaryStreamEncoder.html.name: BinaryStreamEncoder
Classes/BinaryStreamEncoder.html.abstract: Encode elements sequentially into a binary data stream.

Classes/ProtobufDecoder.html.name: ProtobufDecoder
Classes/ProtobufDecoder.html.abstract: An encoder to convert protobuf binary data back to Codable objects.

Classes/ProtobufEncoder.html.name: ProtobufEncoder
Classes/ProtobufEncoder.html.abstract: An encoder to convert Codable objects to protobuf binary data.
